column1: Memorial Visitation will be held from 10-11 AM Wednesday at St. Margaret Mary Catholic Church in Herscher followed by a funeral Mass at 11 AM officiated by Rev. Doug Hauber. Burial will be at Abraham Lincoln National Cemetery in Elwood
column2: IL. Memorials may be made to Harvest View Senoir Living Center or Kankakee Valley Hospice. Arrangements are by Schreffler Funeral Home
